Package org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation

Class BorderOptionsHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.NativeObjectContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.PropertyHandler<IsDefaultsBorderOptionsHandler>
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation.BorderOptionsHandler
  • final class BorderOptionsHandler
extends PropertyHandler<IsDefaultsBorderOptionsHandler>
    Base object to map the border options.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      BorderOptionsHandler​(AbstractAnnotation parent, IsDefaultsBorderOptionsHandler defaultValues, NativeObject nativeObject)
      Creates a border options handler with the native object where border options properties must be managed and the default value to use when the property does not exist.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BorderOptionsHandler

        BorderOptionsHandler​(AbstractAnnotation parent,
                     IsDefaultsBorderOptionsHandler defaultValues,
                     NativeObject nativeObject)
        Creates a border options handler with the native object where border options properties must be managed and the default value to use when the property does not exist.
        Parameters:
        parent - model which contains the border options handler.
        defaultValues - default value of border options to use when the properties do not exist
        nativeObject - native object where border options handler properties must be managed
